p: Blood samples were collected for routine hematological/biochemical analyses on healthy dogs or before anti‐ Leishmania therapy. Biochemical panel was completed with a serum cholesterol profile (HDL, LDL). Serum exosomes were isolated using a polymer‐based kit and characterized by flow cytometry and electron microscopy. miR‐122‐5p expression was analyzed via quantitative RT‐PCR. Differences between the two groups were statistical analyzed. A P value of <0.05 was considered significant.
